get.summary: Parameters queries the parameters of the module.

GasPrice returns the current dynamicfee module gas price
for specified denom.

parameters.description: denom we are querying gas price in
parameters.name: denom

get.summary:
GasPrices returns the current dynamicfee module list of gas prices
in all available denoms.
Params returns the current dynamicfee module parameters.
State returns the current dynamicfee module state.
Constitution queries the chain's constitution.

MinDeposit queries the minimum deposit currently
required for a proposal to enter voting period.

MinInitialDeposit queries the minimum initial deposit
currently required for a proposal to be submitted.
Params queries all parameters of the gov module.

parameters.description:
params_type defines which parameters to query for, can be one of "voting",
"tallying" or "deposit".
parameters.name: params_type

get.summary:
ParticipationEMAs queries the state of the proposal participation
exponential moving averages.
Proposals queries all proposals based on given status.

parameters.description:
proposal_status defines the status of the proposals.

 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED defines the default proposal status.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_DEPOSIT_PERIOD: PROPOSAL_STATUS_DEPOSIT_PERIOD defines a proposal status during the deposit
period.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_VOTING_PERIOD: PROPOSAL_STATUS_VOTING_PERIOD defines a proposal status during the voting
period.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
passed.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
been rejected.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_FAILED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_FAILED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
failed.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_VETOED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_VETOED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
been vetoed.
parameters.name: proposal_status

parameters.description: voter defines the voter address for the proposals.
parameters.name: voter

parameters.description: depositor defines the deposit addresses from the proposals.
parameters.name: depositor

parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.
parameters.name: pagination.key

parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.
parameters.name: pagination.offset

parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.
parameters.name: pagination.limit

parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.
parameters.name: pagination.count_total

parameters.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43
parameters.name: pagination.reverse

atomone.coredaos.v1.MsgExtendVotingPerio.description: MsgExtendVotingPeriodResponse defines the response for MsgExtendVotingPeriod.

MsgUpdateParams message.

atomone.coredaos.v1.MsgVetoProposalRespo.description: MsgVetoProposalResponse defines the response for MsgVetoProposal.

atomone.coredaos.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the x/coredaos module.

oversight_dao_address.description:
oversight_dao_address defines the address which has authority
to execute messages as Oversight DAO.

steering_dao_address.description:
steering_dao_address defines the address which has authority
to execute messages as Steering DAO.

voting_period_extension_duration.description:
voting_period_extension_duration defines the duration for which
a proposal's voting period can be extended.

voting_period_extensions_limit.description:
voting_period_extensions_limit defines the maximum number of times
a proposal's voting period can be extended.

atomone.coredaos.v1.QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

atomone.dynamicfee.v1.GasPriceResponse.description:
GasPriceResponse is the response type for the Query/GasPrice RPC method.
Returns a gas price in specified denom.

atomone.dynamicfee.v1.GasPricesResponse.description:
GasPricesResponse is the response type for the Query/GasPrices RPC method.
Returns a gas price in all available denoms.

atomone.dynamicfee.v1.MsgUpdateParamsRes.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

atomone.dynamicfee.v1.Params.description:
Params contains the required set of parameters for the EIP1559 dynamic fee
pricing implementation.

alpha.description:
Alpha is the amount we additively increase the learning rate
when it is above or below the target +/- threshold.

Must be > 0.

beta.description:
Beta is the amount we multiplicatively decrease the learning rate
when it is within the target +/- threshold.

Must be [0, 1].

default_max_block_gas.description:
DefaultMaxBlockGas is the default max block gas.
This parameter is used by the dynamicfee module
in the case consensus_params.block.max_gas returns 0 or -1.

enabled.description:
Enabled is a boolean that determines whether the EIP1559 dynamic fee
pricing is enabled.

fee_denom.description: FeeDenom is the denom that will be used for all fee payments.

gamma.description:
Gamma is the threshold for the learning rate. If the learning rate is
above or below the target +/- threshold, we additively increase the
learning rate by Alpha. Otherwise, we multiplicatively decrease the
learning rate by Beta.

Must be [0, 0.5].

max_learning_rate.description: MaxLearningRate is the upper bound for the learning rate.

min_base_gas_price.description:
MinBaseGasPrice determines the initial gas price of the module and the
global minimum for the network.

min_learning_rate.description: MinLearningRate is the lower bound for the learning rate.

target_block_utilization.description:
TargetBlockUtilization is the target block utilization expressed as a
decimal value between 0 and 1. It is the target percentage utilization
of the block in relation to the consensus_params.block.max_gas parameter.

window.description:
Window defines the window size for calculating an adaptive learning rate
over a moving window of blocks.

atomone.dynamicfee.v1.ParamsResponse.description: ParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

atomone.dynamicfee.v1.State.description:
State is utilized to track the current state of the dynamic fee pricer.
This includes the current base fee, learning rate, and block gas within the
specified AIMD window.

base_gas_price.description:
BaseGasPrice is the current base fee. This is denominated in the fee per
gas unit.

index.description: Index is the index of the current block in the block gas window.

learning_rate.description: LearningRate is the current learning rate.

window.description:
Window contains a list of the last blocks' gas values. This is used
to calculate the next base fee. This stores the number of units of gas
consumed per block.

atomone.dynamicfee.v1.StateResponse.description: StateResponse is the response type for the Query/State RPC method.

atomone.gov.v1.Deposit.description:
Deposit defines an amount deposited by an account address to an active
proposal.

amount.description: amount to be deposited by depositor.

depositor.description: depositor defines the deposit addresses from the proposals.

proposal_id.description: proposal_id defines the unique id of the proposal.

atomone.gov.v1.DepositParams.description: DepositParams defines the params for deposits on governance proposals.

max_deposit_period.description:
Maximum period for Atom holders to deposit on a proposal. Initial value: 2
months.

min_deposit.description: Minimum deposit for a proposal to enter voting period.

decrease_ratio.description:
The ratio of decrease for the minimum deposit when the number of active
proposals is 1 less than the target.

decrease_sensitivity_target_distance.description:
A positive integer representing the sensitivity of dynamic minimum deposit
decreases to the distance from the target number of active proposals.
The higher the number, the lower the sensitivity. A value of 1 represents
the highest sensitivity.

floor_value.description:
Floor value for the minimum deposit required for a proposal to enter the
voting period.

increase_ratio.description:
The ratio of increase for the minimum deposit when the number of active
proposals is at or above the target.

target_active_proposals.description: The number of active proposals the dynamic minimum deposit should target.

update_period.description:
Duration that dictates after how long the dynamic minimum deposit should be
recalculated for time-based decreases.

decrease_ratio.description:
The ratio of decrease for the minimum initial deposit when the number of
proposals in deposit period is 1 less than the target.

decrease_sensitivity_target_distance.description:
A positive integer representing the sensitivity of dynamic minimum initial
deposit decreases to the distance from the target number of proposals
in deposit period. The higher the number, the lower the sensitivity. A
value of 1 represents the highest sensitivity.

floor_value.description:
Floor value for the minimum initial deposit required for a proposal to
enter the deposit period.

increase_ratio.description:
The ratio of increase for the minimum initial deposit when the number of
proposals in deposit period is at or above the target.

target_proposals.description:
The number of proposals in deposit period the dynamic minimum initial
deposit should target.

update_period.description:
Duration that dictates after how long the dynamic minimum deposit should be
recalculated for time-based decreases.

atomone.gov.v1.MsgDepositResponse.description: MsgDepositResponse defines the Msg/Deposit response type.

atomone.gov.v1.MsgExecLegacyContentRespo.description: MsgExecLegacyContentResponse defines the Msg/ExecLegacyContent response type.

atomone.gov.v1.MsgProposeConstitutionAme.description:
MsgProposeConstitutionAmendmentResponse defines the response structure for
executing a MsgProposeConstitutionAmendment message.

atomone.gov.v1.MsgProposeLawResponse.description:
MsgProposeLawResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgProposeLaw message.

atomone.gov.v1.MsgSubmitProposalResponse.description: MsgSubmitProposalResponse defines the Msg/SubmitProposal response type.

proposal_id.description: proposal_id defines the unique id of the proposal.

atomone.gov.v1.MsgUpdateParamsResponse.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.47

atomone.gov.v1.MsgVoteResponse.description: MsgVoteResponse defines the Msg/Vote response type.

atomone.gov.v1.MsgVoteWeightedResponse.description: MsgVoteWeightedResponse defines the Msg/VoteWeighted response type.

atomone.gov.v1.Params.description:
Params defines the parameters for the x/gov module.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.47

burn_deposit_no_threshold.description: Minimum proportion of No Votes for a proposal deposit to be burnt.

burn_proposal_deposit_prevote.title: burn deposits if the proposal does not enter voting period

burn_vote_quorum.title: burn deposits if a proposal does not meet quorum

constitution_amendment_quorum_range.title: Achievable quorum for constitution amendment proposals

constitution_amendment_threshold.description:
Minimum proportion of Yes votes for a Constitution Amendment proposal to
pass. Default value: 0.9.

law_threshold.description:
Minimum proportion of Yes votes for a Law proposal to pass. Default value:
0.9.

max_deposit_period.description:
Maximum period for Atom holders to deposit on a proposal. Initial value: 2
months.

max_voting_period_extension.description:
Duration that expresses the maximum amount of time by which a proposal
voting period can be extended.

min_deposit.description:
Minimum deposit for a proposal to enter voting period.
Deprecated: a dynamic system now determines the minimum deposit,
see the other params inside the min_deposit_throttler field.
While setting this value returns an error, when queried it is set to the
value of the current minimum deposit value as determined by the dynamic
system for backward compatibility.

min_deposit_ratio.description:
The ratio representing the proportion of the deposit value minimum that
must be met when making a deposit. Default value: 0.01. Meaning that for a
chain with a min_deposit of 100stake, a deposit of 1stake would be
required.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.50
NOTE: backported from v50 (https://github.com/cosmos/cosmos-sdk/pull/18146)

min_initial_deposit_ratio.description:
The ratio representing the proportion of the deposit value that must be
 paid at proposal submission.

quorum.description:
Minimum percentage of total stake needed to vote for a result to be
 considered valid. Default value: 0.25.

quorum_check_count.description:
Number of times a proposal should be checked for quorum after the quorum
timeout has elapsed. Used to compute the amount of time in between quorum
checks.

quorum_timeout.description:
Duration of time after a proposal enters the voting period, during which
quorum must be achieved to not incur in a voting period extension.

threshold.description: Minimum proportion of Yes votes for proposal to pass. Default value: 2/3.

atomone.gov.v1.Proposal.description: Proposal defines the core field members of a governance proposal.

annotation.description:
annotation is an optional field that contains annotations
added by the Steering DAO.

deposit_end_time.description: deposit_end_time is the end time for deposition.

endorsed.description:
endorsed is a boolean indicating whether the proposal has been endorsed
by the Steering DAO.

final_tally_result.description:
final_tally_result is the final tally result of the proposal. When
querying a proposal via gRPC, this field is not populated until the
proposal's voting period has ended.

id.description: id defines the unique id of the proposal.

messages.description: messages are the arbitrary messages to be executed if the proposal passes.

metadata.description: metadata is any arbitrary metadata attached to the proposal.

proposer.title: Proposer is the address of the proposal sumbitter

submit_time.description: submit_time is the time of proposal submission.

summary.title: summary is a short summary of the proposal

times_voting_period_extended.description:
times_voting_period_extended is the number of times the voting period
has been extended from one of the core DAOs.

title.title: title is the title of the proposal

total_deposit.description: total_deposit is the total deposit on the proposal.

voting_end_time.description: voting_end_time is the end time of voting on a proposal.

voting_start_time.description: voting_start_time is the starting time to vote on a proposal.

atomone.gov.v1.ProposalStatus.description:
ProposalStatus enumerates the valid statuses of a proposal.

 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED defines the default proposal status.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_DEPOSIT_PERIOD: PROPOSAL_STATUS_DEPOSIT_PERIOD defines a proposal status during the deposit
period.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_VOTING_PERIOD: PROPOSAL_STATUS_VOTING_PERIOD defines a proposal status during the voting
period.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
passed.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
been rejected.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_FAILED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_FAILED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
failed.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_VETOED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_VETOED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
been vetoed.

deposit_params defines the parameters related to deposit.

params.description:
params defines all the paramaters of x/gov module.

QueryParticipationEMAsResponse is the response type for the
Query/ParticipationEMAs RPC method.

constitution_amendment_participation_ema.description:
constitution_amendment_participation_ema defines the requested
participation EMA for constitution amendment proposals.

law_participation_ema.description:
law_participation_ema defines the requestedparticipation EMA for law
proposals.

participation_ema.description: participation_ema defines the requested participation EMA for proposals.

atomone.gov.v1.QueryProposalResponse.description: QueryProposalResponse is the response type for the Query/Proposal RPC method.

proposal.description: proposal is the requested governance proposal.

atomone.gov.v1.QueryProposalsResponse.description:
QueryProposalsResponse is the response type for the Query/Proposals RPC
method.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

proposals.description: proposals defines all the requested governance proposals.

atomone.gov.v1.QueryQuorumsResponse.description: QueryQuorumsResponse is the response type for the Query/Quorums RPC method.

constitution_amendment_quorum.description:
constitution_amendment_quorum defines the requested quorum for
constitution amendment proposals.

law_quorum.description: law_quorum defines the requested quorum for law proposals.

atomone.gov.v1.QueryTallyResultResponse.description: QueryTallyResultResponse is the response type for the Query/Tally RPC method.

atomone.gov.v1.QueryVoteResponse.description: QueryVoteResponse is the response type for the Query/Vote RPC method.

atomone.gov.v1.QueryVotesResponse.description: QueryVotesResponse is the response type for the Query/Votes RPC method.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

atomone.gov.v1.TallyParams.description: TallyParams defines the params for tallying votes on governance proposals.

constitution_amendment_threshold.description:
Minimum proportion of Yes votes for a Constitution Amendment proposal to
pass. Default value: 0.9.

law_threshold.description:
Minimum proportion of Yes votes for a Law proposal to pass. Default value:
0.9.

quorum.description:
Minimum percentage of total stake needed to vote for a result to be
considered valid.

threshold.description: Minimum proportion of Yes votes for proposal to pass. Default value: 2/3.

atomone.gov.v1.TallyResult.description: TallyResult defines a standard tally for a governance proposal.

abstain_count.description: abstain_count is the number of abstain votes on a proposal.

no_count.description: no_count is the number of no votes on a proposal.

yes_count.description: yes_count is the number of yes votes on a proposal.

atomone.gov.v1.Vote.description:
Vote defines a vote on a governance proposal.
A Vote consists of a proposal ID, the voter, and the vote option.

metadata.description: metadata is any  arbitrary metadata to attached to the vote.

options.description: options is the weighted vote options.

proposal_id.description: proposal_id defines the unique id of the proposal.

voter.description: voter is the voter address of the proposal.

atomone.gov.v1.VoteOption.description:
VoteOption enumerates the valid vote options for a given governance proposal.

 - VOTE_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED: VOTE_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED defines a no-op vote option.
 - VOTE_OPTION_YES: VOTE_OPTION_YES defines a yes vote option.
 - VOTE_OPTION_ABSTAIN: VOTE_OPTION_ABSTAIN defines an abstain vote option.
 - VOTE_OPTION_NO: VOTE_OPTION_NO defines a no vote option.

atomone.gov.v1.VotingParams.description: VotingParams defines the params for voting on governance proposals.

atomone.gov.v1.WeightedVoteOption.description: WeightedVoteOption defines a unit of vote for vote split.

option.description:
option defines the valid vote options, it must not contain duplicate vote
options.

weight.description: weight is the vote weight associated with the vote option.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.Deposit.description:
Deposit defines an amount deposited by an account address to an active
proposal.

amount.description: amount to be deposited by depositor.

depositor.description: depositor defines the deposit addresses from the proposals.

proposal_id.description: proposal_id defines the unique id of the proposal.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.DepositParams.description: DepositParams defines the params for deposits on governance proposals.

max_deposit_period.description:
Maximum period for Atom holders to deposit on a proposal. Initial value: 2
months.

min_deposit.description: Minimum deposit for a proposal to enter voting period.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.MsgDepositResponse.description: MsgDepositResponse defines the Msg/Deposit response type.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.MsgSubmitProposalRes.description: MsgSubmitProposalResponse defines the Msg/SubmitProposal response type.

proposal_id.description: proposal_id defines the unique id of the proposal.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.MsgVoteResponse.description: MsgVoteResponse defines the Msg/Vote response type.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.MsgVoteWeightedRespo.description:
MsgVoteWeightedResponse defines the Msg/VoteWeighted response type.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

atomone.gov.v1beta1.Proposal.description: Proposal defines the core field members of a governance proposal.

deposit_end_time.description: deposit_end_time is the end time for deposition.

final_tally_result.description:
final_tally_result is the final tally result of the proposal. When
querying a proposal via gRPC, this field is not populated until the
proposal's voting period has ended.

proposal_id.description: proposal_id defines the unique id of the proposal.

submit_time.description: submit_time is the time of proposal submission.

total_deposit.description: total_deposit is the total deposit on the proposal.

voting_end_time.description: voting_end_time is the end time of voting on a proposal.

voting_start_time.description: voting_start_time is the starting time to vote on a proposal.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.ProposalStatus.description:
ProposalStatus enumerates the valid statuses of a proposal.

 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED defines the default proposal status.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_DEPOSIT_PERIOD: PROPOSAL_STATUS_DEPOSIT_PERIOD defines a proposal status during the deposit
period.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_VOTING_PERIOD: PROPOSAL_STATUS_VOTING_PERIOD defines a proposal status during the voting
period.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
passed.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
been rejected.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_FAILED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_FAILED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
failed.
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_VETOED: PROPOSAL_STATUS_VETOED defines a proposal status of a proposal that has
been vetoed.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.QueryDepositResponse.description: QueryDepositResponse is the response type for the Query/Deposit RPC method.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.QueryDepositsRespons.description: QueryDepositsResponse is the response type for the Query/Deposits RPC method.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

deposit_params.description: deposit_params defines the parameters related to deposit.

tally_params.description: tally_params defines the parameters related to tally.

voting_params.description: voting_params defines the parameters related to voting.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.QueryProposalRespons.description: QueryProposalResponse is the response type for the Query/Proposal RPC method.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.QueryProposalsRespon.description:
QueryProposalsResponse is the response type for the Query/Proposals RPC
method.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

proposals.description: proposals defines all the requested governance proposals.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.QueryTallyResultResp.description: QueryTallyResultResponse is the response type for the Query/Tally RPC method.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.QueryVoteResponse.description: QueryVoteResponse is the response type for the Query/Vote RPC method.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.QueryVotesResponse.description: QueryVotesResponse is the response type for the Query/Votes RPC method.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.TallyParams.description: TallyParams defines the params for tallying votes on governance proposals.

quorum.description:
Minimum percentage of total stake needed to vote for a result to be
considered valid.

threshold.description: Minimum proportion of Yes votes for proposal to pass. Default value: 2/3.

veto_threshold.description:
Minimum value of Veto votes to Total votes ratio for proposal to be
vetoed. Default value: 0 (disabled).

atomone.gov.v1beta1.TallyResult.description: TallyResult defines a standard tally for a governance proposal.

abstain.description: abstain is the number of abstain votes on a proposal.

no.description: no is the number of no votes on a proposal.

no_with_veto.description: no_with_veto is the number of no with veto votes on a proposal.

yes.description: yes is the number of yes votes on a proposal.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.Vote.description:
Vote defines a vote on a governance proposal.
A Vote consists of a proposal ID, the voter, and the vote option.

option.description:
Deprecated: Prefer to use `options` instead. This field is set in queries
if and only if `len(options) == 1` and that option has weight 1. In all
other cases, this field will default to VOTE_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED.

options.description:
options is the weighted vote options.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

proposal_id.description: proposal_id defines the unique id of the proposal.

voter.description: voter is the voter address of the proposal.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.VoteOption.description:
VoteOption enumerates the valid vote options for a given governance proposal.

 - VOTE_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED: VOTE_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED defines a no-op vote option.
 - VOTE_OPTION_YES: VOTE_OPTION_YES defines a yes vote option.
 - VOTE_OPTION_ABSTAIN: VOTE_OPTION_ABSTAIN defines an abstain vote option.
 - VOTE_OPTION_NO: VOTE_OPTION_NO defines a no vote option.
 - VOTE_OPTION_NO_WITH_VETO: VOTE_OPTION_NO_WITH_VETO defines a no with veto vote option.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.VotingParams.description: VotingParams defines the params for voting on governance proposals.

atomone.gov.v1beta1.WeightedVoteOption.description:
WeightedVoteOption defines a unit of vote for vote split.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

option.description:
option defines the valid vote options, it must not contain duplicate vote
options.

weight.description: weight is the vote weight associated with the vote option.

atomone.photon.v1.MsgMintPhotonResponse.description:
MsgMintPhotonResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgMintPhoton message.

conversion_rate.description: conversion_rate represents the factor used to convert atone to photon.

atomone.photon.v1.MsgUpdateParamsRespons.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

atomone.photon.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the x/photon module.

mint_disabled.title: Allow to mint photon or not

tx_fee_exceptions.description:
tx_fee_exceptions holds the msg type urls that are allowed to use some
different tx fee coins than photon.
A wildcard "*" can be used to allow all transactions to use any fee denom.

atomone.photon.v1.QueryConversionRateRes.description:
QueryConversionRateResponse is response type for the Query/ConversionRate RPC
method.

conversion_rate.description: conversion_rate represents the factor used to convert atone to photon.

atomone.photon.v1.QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

count_total.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

reverse.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

next_key.description:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently. It will be empty if
there are no more results.

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description:
Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.DecCoin.description:
DecCoin defines a token with a denomination and a decimal amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Dec which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.
